title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 412: Featuring Ryan Kesler
description:
On Episode 412 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Ryan Kesler. Kes joined (1:07:34) to discuss his career, giving his body to the game, coaching his kids and tons more. But first, the boys open the show talking about the red hot Buffalo Sabres and Philadelphia Flyers. The guys also dive into the mess in Vancouver with the Canucks. The guys touch on all the news across the NHL and wrap up discussing the recent Ben Volin-Patriots drama.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
